param.name: id_tax_charge
param.description: Primary key for this tax charge

param.name: amount
param.description: Amount to be taxed

param.name: bus_class_ind
param.description: Business class indicator (C-CLEC or I-ILEC)

param.name: call_duration
param.description: Call duration time

param.name: client_resale
param.description: "S-Sale, R-Resale"

param.name: customer_type
param.description: "B/R/I/S B- Business, I-Industrina, R-Residental Customer, S- Senior Citizen"

param.name: facilities_flag
param.description: facilities based flag (F or N)

param.name: franchise_flag
param.description: Franchise or Non-Franchise (F or N)

param.name: id_acc
param.description: Customer account id. Will be used to define PK in BIllSoft generated logs

param.name: inc_code
param.description: Customer Inside or Outside incorporated area

param.name: invoice_date
param.description: Date of the invoice

param.name: invoice_id
param.description: "Used in the tax vendor's audit information. In the audit, the invoice_id may be reported with the corresponding tax details."

param.name: is_implied_tax
param.description: Y/N. Implied means taxes are included in the amount

param.name: is_regulated
param.description: "Reseller regulated or unregulated in the state of sale. R-Regulated, U-Unregulated"

param.name: lifeline_flag
param.description: "L- lifeline customer, I - not lifeline"

param.name: lines
param.description: "When local service is provided, a transaction should be generated with the Lines field populated with the number of lines the customer subscribes to. "

param.name: location
param.description: "When local service is provided, the Locations Field should be populated with the number of locations the customer has. "

param.name: orig_pcode
param.description: Originating PCode

param.name: product_code
param.description: "Product code to be mapped to Transaction Type, Service Type"

param.name: round_alg
param.description: "rounding algorith. None for no rounding, MATH for regular rounding, BANK - for bankers rounding."

param.name: round_digits
param.description: "0 - no rounding, 1 round to 1 digit after decimal point"

param.name: svc_addr_pcode
param.description: Service Address PCode

param.name: svc_class_ind
param.description: Long Distance or Local primary (D or L)

param.name: telecom_type
param.description: "C-Calls(telcom), D-Debit Card Calls, P-Point of sale"

param.name: term_pcode
param.description: Termination PCode
